sentence.Network_en: The grins of his friends discomposed Jack when he tried to make his speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克想要进行演讲时,他的朋友们咧着嘴笑,这使得他心里很慌乱.

sentence.Network_en: The bad news of the accident discomposed me.
sentence.Network_cn: 发生事故的坏消息使我心神不定。

sentence.Network_en: Impurities and odor in the washing drum and pipes discomposed by its strong detoxication.
sentence.Network_cn: 它具有强大的去毒性,可去除洗衣桶和排水管里的杂质和气味.
